trans-unit.source: 1a. Select a video file (only tested with .mp4 currently)
trans-unit.target: 1a.Seleccione un archivo de vídeo (sólo probado con .mp4 actualmente)

trans-unit.source: 1b. Click the Live tab to record as you play.
trans-unit.target: 1b.Haz clic en la pestaña En vivo para grabar mientras tocas.

trans-unit.source: NOTE: PUBGIS live recording does not currently work when running PUBG Fullscreen (Fullscreen (Windowed) is OK). I’m tracking Issue#41. Sorry for the inconvenience.
trans-unit.target: NOTE: PUBGIS live recording does not currently work when running PUBG Fullscreen (Fullscreen (Windowed) is OK). I’m tracking Issue#41. Sorry for the inconvenience.

trans-unit.source: Optional:
trans-unit.target: Optional:

trans-unit.source: Adjust the output file if needed.
trans-unit.target: Ajuste el archivo de salida si es necesario.

trans-unit.source: Adjust the time step. This is how often the map is checked. Larger values will process a game faster, but the path will not be as detailed.
trans-unit.target: Ajustar el paso de tiempo.Esta es la frecuencia con la que se comprueba el mapa.Los valores más grandes procesarán un juego más rápido,pero el camino no será tan detallado.

trans-unit.source: Click Process!
trans-unit.target: Haga clic en Proceso!

trans-unit.source: Development
trans-unit.target: Desarrollo

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: Ejemplos

trans-unit.source: If the video contains extra footage after you die, such as spectating a teammate, input your death time (death time of 00:00 means it will process until the end of the video)
trans-unit.target: If the video contains extra footage after you die, such as spectating a teammate, input your death time (death time of 00:00 means it will process until the end of the video)

trans-unit.source: If the video contains extra footage before your parachute landing, put that time in landing time
trans-unit.target: If the video contains extra footage before your parachute landing, put that time in landing time

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: Instalación

trans-unit.source: License
trans-unit.target: Licencia

trans-unit.source: PUBG Location Tracker
trans-unit.target: Rastreador de localización PUBG

trans-unit.source: PUBGIS (PUBG Geographic Information System) analyzes gameplay from PUBG (either live or video) and tracks your position during the game. You can view this information later to see your path throughout the game.
trans-unit.target: PUBGIS (PUBG Geographic Information System) analyzes gameplay from PUBG (either live or video) and tracks your position during the game. You can view this information later to see your path throughout the game.

trans-unit.source: PUBGIS is a self-contained executable. Download the latest version here, no installation required!
trans-unit.target: PUBGIS is a self-contained executable. Download the latest version here, no installation required!

trans-unit.source: PUBGIS is written in Python (3.6). If you’d like to use PUBGIS as a python package, you can install it using
trans-unit.target: PUBGIS is written in Python (3.6). If you’d like to use PUBGIS as a python package, you can install it using

trans-unit.source: PUBGIS works by continuously scanning the minimap in the corner of the game (seen below) and matching that to a location on the world map. If you want more details about how PUBGIS works, check out the Theory of Operation wiki page
trans-unit.target: PUBGIS works by continuously scanning the minimap in the corner of the game (seen below) and matching that to a location on the world map. If you want more details about how PUBGIS works, check out the Theory of Operation wiki page

trans-unit.source: Select a different color path
trans-unit.target: Seleccione una ruta de color diferente...

trans-unit.source: This project is licensed under the GPLv3 License - see the LICENSE.md file for details
trans-unit.target: This project is licensed under the GPLv3 License - see the LICENSE.md file for details

trans-unit.source: To learn more about extending or contributing to PUBGIS, check out the Development page.
trans-unit.target: To learn more about extending or contributing to PUBGIS, check out the Development page.
